home.description: Experienced in developing web applications and REST APIs with React, Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Focused on clean code, API integration, and responsive user-centered design, with strong collaboration in Agile/Scrum environments.

about.title: About Me
about.description: A brief insight into who I am, my journey, and expertise.
about.me: I'm Neng Rahmawati, a student of Informatics Management at Universitas Nasional PASIM. As a PUB Scholarship recipient, I have undergone two years of intensive training that built strong technical skills in Java, React, database management, and REST API. Experienced in team projects, I focus on developing user-friendly applications and efficient API integration. I am a fast learner, collaborative, and passionate about delivering quality technical solutions. I am also a responsible individual who is always ready to keep learning and growing, ensuring that every task I take on is completed with commitment, reliability, and a strong drive to contribute effectively to any team or project.

certificate.title: Certificates
certificate.description: Each certificate is a small step in my bigger journey of learning and growing. This is a collection of achievements I've accumulated over the past 2 years.

project.title: My Projects
project.description: A collection of my projects that demonstrates my experience and expertise in technology.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or just want to say hi.

timeline.title: Diploma in Informatics Management
description: PUB Scholarship recipient, participated in an intensive 2-year program.
Participated in training courses ranging from Logic & Algorithms, to Fundamental and Advanced Programming, each consisting of 16 sessions.
Worked on application development projects approximately every 4 months.
Actively participated in team projects to develop applications and User-friendly API integration.

timeline.title: Natural Sciences
description: Grade point average: 91.45
Ranked 4th out of 160 science students
Completed high school with a focus on natural sciences.
Member of the Science Club and Physics Olympiad team.
Organized a school-level science fair.

timeline.title: Fundamental Front-End Programming Training (React)
description: Learned the basics of React JS for front-end development.
Built interactive web applications using React.

timeline.title: Advanced Back-End Programming Training (Java)
description: Studied advanced back-end concepts such as REST API and MVC.
Built more complex back-end applications using Java.
Integrated back-end with databases.

timeline.title: GitHub Training
description: Learned version control using Git and GitHub.
Practiced team collaboration through GitHub repositories.
Managed branches, merges, and pull requests in team projects.

timeline.title: Fundamental Back-End Programming Training (Java)
description: Learned the basics of Java programming for back-end development.
Studied Object-Oriented Programming concepts including classes, objects, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Integrated database with Java applications.

timeline.title: Web Programming Training (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
description: Learned the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Built simple interactive websites.
Integrated front-end with simple external APIs to dynamically display data.

timeline.title: Database Training
description: Studied relational database concepts and SQL.
Managed databases using MySQL.
Learned JOIN operations, aggregate functions, and basic database operations.

timeline.title: Data Structure Training
description: Learned advanced data structure concepts such as queue, tree, and graph.
Implemented data structures in C programming.
Completed mini projects to solve complex algorithm problems.

timeline.title: Logic & Algorithm Training (C Programming Language)
description: Learned basic programming logic and algorithms using C.
Understood fundamental data structures such as arrays and created CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete).
Implemented a final project using a console-based CRUD application for hands-on data management practice.
